主页 › 存档 › FriendFeed的聊天机器人

FriendFeed的聊天机器人

Feb 27 2009 | WordPressBackup

闲谈莫论人非 －清·金缨《格言联壁》

今天FriendFeed新推出一个room叫做Eliza, 作用是'Ask questions to an insightful virtual therapist, get useless answers.' 也就是一个聊天机器人. 加入这个room后往上面发消息就会得到机器人的自动回复. 仅限英文. 此机器人用Python编写, 并给出了源代码, 其中用到了eliza module, Python迷们可以去研究一下.下面是我刚刚随便聊的几句, 虽然这机器人还有点傻, 不过没人聊天时可以去逗逗TA.

“I hate rain or I love rain? I'm not sure.” 38 minutes ago @pala Why do you ask that? - Eliza It's raining now. - You @pala Please tell me more. - Eliza more about what? the weather? - You @pala Please consider whether you can answer your own question. - Eliza I drove you crazy, didn't I? - You via IM @pala Why don't you tell me? - Eliza I think I did - You @pala Do you doubt you did? - Eliza I like crazy people - You via IM @pala I see. - Eliza you r smarter than I thought - You via IM @pala Why do you care whether I r smarter than you thought? - Eliza because you are my friend. - You via IM @pala Is that the real reason? - Eliza I think so. - You via IM @pala But you're not sure so.? - Eliza never mind. can you speak Chinese? like 我不会说? - You via IM @pala Why do you ask that? - Eliza 我在问你呢, 用中文. - You via IM @pala Can you elaborate on that? - Eliza I'm leaving now, ttyl - You via IM @pala Why do you think you're leaving now, ttyl? - Eliza I ask, you answer, not conversely. - You @pala How do you feel when you say that? - Eliza Seriously, I'm leaving you. Just sign that paper please. - You via IM @pala Can you elaborate on that? - Eliza

最后一句很冷, 不过TA肯定感觉不到
